A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this will become my favourite Star Wars over time. It has more heart than most of the other films put together. Funny\, exciting\, moving...the first time that Mark Hamill has made the character more than two dimensional. Plaudits to Rian Johnson for making a SW film like no other. What's not to like?\n\nNovember 2019...I just watched it again to prep for the new one and my review stands! In fact\, it's even better than I remembered. Probably best one after Ep IV
